column1: Local Foods////Try the smoked salmon sandwich. You won't regret it. The Tuscan kale is amazing even if you don't care for greens. I haven't tasted anything here that I didn't absolutely love. The atmosphere is great. Great place for lunch - even dinner if it stayed open later. Also try the mint-aid at least once! I often get the Harvest Salad - it's full of fresh veggies and will keep you satisfied all day long. Not like any other salad I've ever had.
